title: Malaysia Airlines- Policy for Air Travel During...
text: Malaysia Airlines A pregnant passenger with an uncomplicated pregnancy may travel up until the 35th week. A doctor's or midwife's letter should be carried confirming that a pregnant passenger is fit to travel, along with the anticipated due date. Malaysia Airlines states that air travel is not recommended in the last month of pregnancy up until seven days after delivery. Related Articles
